Package de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt.material.layout

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMaterialLayout
    The base class for GwtMaterial layouts.
    MaterialCardLayout
    GWT Material implementation of card layouts.
    MaterialContentLayout
    GWT Material implementation for content-specific layouts.
    MaterialContentLayout.GewtMaterialCollapsibleHeader
    Subclassed to implement the HasActive interface.
    MaterialLayoutFactory
    A factory and mapper that creates layouts or maps GEWT layouts to new layouts that are based on GwtMaterialDesign widgets.
    MaterialListItemLayout
    GWT Material implementation for list-style layouts.
    MaterialListItemLayout.GewtMaterialCollapsibleItem
    Implements HasEventHandlingDelay.
    MaterialListLayout
    GWT Material implementation for list-style layouts.
    MaterialListLayout.GewtMaterialCollapsible
    A MaterialCollapsible subclass that also implements single selection.
    MaterialMainViewLayout
    The main view layout for GWT Material.
    MaterialMenuLayout
    A subclass of MenuLayout that creates material menu widgets.
    MaterialMenuLayout.GewtMaterialNavBar
    TODO: DOCUMENT ME!
    MaterialSplitPanelLayout
    A layout implementation that creates and manages a MaterialSplitPanel.
    MaterialStackPanelLayout
    A layout implementation that creates and manages a MaterialStepper.
    MaterialSwitchPanelLayout<P extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets,W extends gwt.material.design.client.base.MaterialWidget>
    A base class for GWT Material switch panels that manages the content widgets and the wrapping widgets that contain them and that can be switched between.
    MaterialTabPanelLayout
    A layout implementation that creates and manages a MaterialTab widget.
    MaterialTabPanelLayout.GewtMaterialTab
    Subclassed to fix a GMD bug.
    MaterialTabPanelLayout.GewtMaterialTabItem
    Subclassed to fix a GMD bug.
